summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of North and West 60th Street, in the City of Seattle, from 8th Avenue Northwest to Phinney Avenue, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wooden cross walks together with all necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 880 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
